title: Expert Picks: The Honda Classic
text:
Expert Picks: The Honda Classic February 21, 2017 In three starts at PGA National, Russell Knox has gone P2-T3-T26. (Sean M. Haffey/Getty Images) 
How it works: Each week, our experts from PGATOUR.COM will make their selections in PGA TOUR Fantasy Golf driven by AVIS . Each lineup consists of four starters and two bench players that can be rotated after each round. The first fantasy golf game to utilize live ShotLink data, PGA TOUR Fantasy Golf driven by AVIS allows you to see scores update live during competition. To learn more or sign up click here. 
EXPERT PICKS: The Honda Classic 
EXPERT 
EXPERT PICKS: The Honda Classic 
SEAN MARTIN 
He’s had his close calls here before, and that was before he was one of the top 20 players in the world. 
EXPERT 
PROJECTED WINNER 
Russell Knox 
He’s had his close calls here before, and that was before he was one of the top 20 players in the world. 
BEN EVERILL 
Scott blew off some competitive rust in LA and will defend stoutly. Managed to win despite some water troubles last year. Will streak them if accuracy is on point. 
EXPERT 
PROJECTED WINNER 
Adam Scott 
Scott blew off some competitive rust in LA and will defend stoutly. Managed to win despite some water troubles last year. Will streak them if accuracy is on point. 
MIKE McALLISTER 
A recent winner in Dubai, last week's T49 was his only finish outside the top 20 anywhere since September. 
EXPERT 
PROJECTED WINNER 
Sergio Garcia 
A recent winner in Dubai, last week's T49 was his only finish outside the top 20 anywhere since September. 
MATT COCHRAN 
Sleeping in the comfort of his own bed being a Jupiter resident (like half the field). Placed 2nd in 2015. Coming off two weeks rest after T7 in Phoenix. 
EXPERT 
PROJECTED WINNER 
Daniel Berger 
Sleeping in the comfort of his own bed being a Jupiter resident (like half the field). Placed 2nd in 2015. Coming off two weeks rest after T7 in Phoenix. 
JONATHAN WALL 
Knox has two top-3 finishes in three starts at The Honda Classic. This is the week he grabs third TOUR title. 
EXPERT 
PROJECTED WINNER 
Russell Knox 
Knox has two top-3 finishes in three starts at The Honda Classic. This is the week he grabs third TOUR title. 
ROB BOLTON 
My monster week at Riviera does no good unless I can piggyback it. Goal remains to get four to the final round, but I’ll make room for one dynamic hopeful in RCB. 
EXPERT 
PROJECTED WINNER 
Adam Scott 
My monster week at Riviera does no good unless I can piggyback it. Goal remains to get four to the final round, but I’ll make room for one dynamic hopeful in RCB. 
JAMES HICKEY 
Knox has finished in the top 5 two of the last three years at The Honda. His worst performance is a T26. 
EXPERT 
PROJECTED WINNER 
Russell Knox 
Knox has finished in the top 5 two of the last three years at The Honda. His worst performance is a T26. 
CDW, an official partner of the PGA TOUR, offers its weekly fantasy selection. Here's this week's "Data-Driven Decision." 
The computer selected driving accuracy, scrambling and strokes gained: approach as the three most important statistics this week. After calculating this season's ranks in those categories of every player in the field, the computer made the following prediction for this week's winner.
